GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the requested article by id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments of a given article by id

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts the given comment to the database and responds with the posted comment, comment to be posted has to include a username and body

comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comment.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/article/:article_id.description: updates the given article with an increase or decrease in votes, according to the given object { inc_votes: newVote }, where newVote represents how much the votes property should be updated by

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment by the given id from the database, does not return a response

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/topics/:topic_name.description: serves an object of the requested topic by name (a.k.a slug)

topic.description: The man, the Mitch, the legend

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object of the requested user by username

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the given comment with an increase or decrease in votes, according to the given object { inc_votes: newVote }, where newVote represents how much the votes property should be updated by

comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comment.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles.description: posts the given article to the database and responds with the posted article, article to be posted has to include author, body, title and topic, can also take a value for article_img_url but not required

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/topics.description: posts the given topic to the database and responds with the posted topic, topic to be posted has to include slug and description
